definition: A small compartment typically found on the front of a garment, often used for storing small personal items or essentials. It is commonly used to refer to a specific pocket that is conveniently located and easily accessible.

examples.german: Ich habe mein Handy immer in der Westentasche.
examples.english: I always keep my phone in my breast pocket.

examples.german: Er kennt die Stadt wie seine Westentasche.
examples.english: He knows the city like the back of his hand.

examples.german: Sie hat ihr Notizbuch immer griffbereit in der Westentasche.
examples.english: She always keeps her notebook handy in her breast pocket.

examples.german: Der Schl√ºsselbund steckt in meiner Westentasche.
examples.english: The keychain is in my breast pocket.

examples.german: Er hat das Geld sicher in seiner Westentasche verstaut.
examples.english: He has safely stashed the money in his breast pocket.
